mapper.select: select hos_id, hos_name, hos_medicine, hos_linkphone, hos_logo, hos_grade, (select data_name from bs_basedict where dict_code = 'HOS01' and data_code = hos_grade) hos_grade_name, hos_desc, hos_awards, hos_city, hos_area, crtuser, crtdate from hospital where hos_id = #{id}

SELECT count(*) from hospital where hos_name = #{hosName}
and hos_id != #{hosId}
mapper.insert: insert into hospital(hos_name, hos_grade, hos_logo, hos_city, hos_area, hos_linkphone, hos_medicine, hos_awards, hos_desc, hos_logo, crtuser, crtdate) VALUES (#{hosName}, #{hosGrade}, #{hosLogo}, #{hosCity}, #{hosArea}, #{hosLinkphone}, #{hosMedicine}, #{hosAwards}, #{hosDesc}, #{hosLogo}, #{crtuser}, now())
mapper.update: update hospital set recsts = 'D' where hos_id in #{id}
